title: Social Psychology Quarterly - When a Name Gives You Pause: Racialized Names and Time to Adoption in a County Dog Shelter

description: Author Natasha Quadlin discusses her article, "When a Name Gives You Pause: Racialized Names and Time to Adoption in a County Dog Shelters," published in the June 2022 issue of Social Psychology Quarterly.
